DataElement.preferredName: Health Care Provider Tremor Or Movement Disorder Notification Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator of whether you have been notified of tremors or movement disorders by a healthcare provider.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Health Care Provider Tremor Or Movement Disorder Notification
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Persons who provides health care as part of their job responsibilities: or a person or organization who is licensed to supply health care.:The shaking movement of the whole body or just a certain part of it, often caused by problems of the neurons responsible for muscle action._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._Neurological conditions resulting in abnormal voluntary or involuntary movement, which may impact the speed, fluency, quality and ease of movement._Informing by words.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Persons who provides health care as part of their job responsibilities, or a person or organization who is licensed to supply health care.

Concepts.definition: The shaking movement of the whole body or just a certain part of it, often caused by problems of the neurons responsible for muscle action.
